Pre-Game Insights: The Hornets are 5-13 in home games.
The Suns are 6-10 in road games.
The Hornets lead the Eastern Conference in rebounding, averaging 45.9 boards.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Hornets are on a 10-game losing streak.
The Suns average 14.2 made 3-pointers per game this season, 0.4 more makes per game than the Hornets give up.
LaMelo Ball is averaging 29.8 points, 5.2 rebounds and 7.3 assists for the Hornets.
Devin Booker is scoring 24.1 points per game with 3.8 rebounds and 6.7 assists for the Suns.
Others: Grant Williams is out for the season due to an ACL injury.
Seth Curry is day-to-day with a knee injury.
Tre Mann is out with a back injury.
Royce O'Neale is out with an ankle injury.
